text: Hawthorne of the U.S.A. is a 1919 American silent adventure comedy movie directed by James Cruze and was based on the play of the same name by James B. Fagan. It stars Wallace Reid, Lila Lee, Harrison Ford, Tully Marshall, Charles Ogle, Guy Oliver, Clarence Burton and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1919 comedy movies Category:1910s adventure movies Category:American silent movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by James Cruze Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Hawthorne of the U.S.A.
